divs: Sighting DetailsOn December 10, 2011 around 11:00 pm I was traveling south on route 113 just north of Silverdale Pennsylvania. It was a clear crisp night with a full moon and minimal cloud cover. I saw this bright light coming from the northwest out my passenger side car window. At first I thought it was a plane or helicopter, but the longer I watched the object the more it didn���t appear to be either. I decided I needed to pull over before I got into an accident, so I pulled into a restaurant parking lot. This object was a reddish orange sphere or ball of light traveling towards me at a medium pace. As I watched more of these spheres appeared until there was approximately 5 or 6 of these objects following each other evenly spaced apart. They moved following the same path making no noise, one at a time elevating into the sky, disappearing just south of me. I tried to get some other driver���s attention who were traveling down route 113 by jumping up and down pointing to the objects in the sky. This whole ordeal happened in about 1 minute or so, not a long time, so just a few cars passed. I am sure these people thought I was either a crazy man or drunk. Not sure if I was successful in getting any of the other driver���s attention, but if anyone did see these objects, make a report and submit to MUFON. Being a scientist I tried to rationalize what I saw, but couldn���t come up with any reasonable explanation except that these reddish orange spheres were UFO���s. Doing a little more online searching about UFO sightings, I came across a sighting on December 5, 2011 where several people reported seeing at least two UFOs in Allentown Pennsylvania the direction where these spheres were traveling from. I never thought in my life I would ever see something like this, it is something that you see on TV or have heard, but it is an experience I will never forget.
